generic_models¶

class generic_models.EarlyStop(badlimit=20)[source]¶
Parameters:badlimit – limit of badcount for early stopping
class generic_models.ModelRunner(loss, ph_dict, learnrate=0.01, opt='adam', debug=False)[source]¶

A class for gradient descent training arbitrary models.

Parameters:
  • loss – Loss Tensor for gradient descent optimization (should evaluate to real number).
  • ph_dict – A dictionary with string keys and tensorflow placeholder values.
  • learnrate – step_size for gradient descent.
  • resultfile – Where to print loss during training.
  • debug – Whether to print debugging info.
  • badlimit – Number of times to not improve during training before quitting.
eval(datadict, eval_tensors)[source]¶
train_step(datadict, eval_tensors=[])[source]¶
generic_models.get_feed_dict(datadict, ph_dict, train=1, debug=False)[source]¶

Function for pairing placeholders of a computational graph with numpy arrays.

Parameters:
  • datadict – A dictionary with keys matching keys in ph_dict, and values are numpy matrices.
  • ph_dict – A dictionary where the keys match keys in datadict and values are placeholder tensors.
  • train – {1,0}. Different values get fed to placeholders for dropout probability, and batch norm statistics depending on if model is training or evaluating.
  • debug – (boolean) Whether or not to print dimensions of contents of placeholderdict, and datadict.
Returns:

A feed dictionary with keys of placeholder tensors and values of numpy matrices.
